metadata.title: Collaborative Antimicrobial Stewardship Working with Microbiology

abstract.original_text: Antimicrobial stewardship Role of microbiology laboratory Infectious diseases diagnosis Rapid testing Molecular panels Antibiogram Clostridium difficile

sentences.segment_text: Antimicrobial stewardship Role of microbiology laboratory Infectious diseases diagnosis Rapid testing Molecular panels Antibiogram Clostridium difficile

abstract.original_text: The microbiology laboratory should be integrated into antibiotic stewardship programs.

sentences.segment_text: The microbiology laboratory should be integrated into antibiotic stewardship programs .

abstract.original_text: Rapid diagnostic technologies have the potential of decreasing time to appropriate therapy and improving patient care, and should be implemented in consultation with clinicians, clinical microbiologists, and the antibiotic stewardship team. Antibiotic stewardship teams are helpful to guide clinician use of the microbiology laboratory and interpretation of antimicrobial susceptibility results.

sentences.segment_text: Rapid diagnostic technologies have the potential of decreasing time to appropriate therapy and improving patient care ,
and should be implemented in consultation with clinicians ,
clinical microbiologists , and the antibiotic stewardship team .
Antibiotic stewardship teams are helpful to guide clinician use of the microbiology laboratory and interpretation of antimicrobial susceptibility results .
